readable.content: A brown and black dog laying on a grey plushie in front of a TV showing breaking news . A dog in a living room laying on a stuffed animal with a television in the background . A small dog grinding against a stuffed animal . A small dog laying on a stuffed animal in front of a TV Dog climbing on stuffed animals indoors , background TV shows breaking news .
